00020 #ifndef TLM_FIFO_PEEK_HEADER
00021 #define TLM_FIFO_PEEK_HEADER
00022 
00023 #ifndef TLM_FIFO_HEADER
00024 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo.h"
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 template < typename T>
00028 inline
00029 T
00030 tlm_fifo<T>::peek( tlm_tag<T> * ) const {
00031 
00032   while( is_empty() ) {
00033 
00034     // this const cast is only needed because sc_prim_channel::wait(.) is
00035     // for some unknown reason, not const
00036 
00037     const_cast< tlm_fifo<T> * >( this )->wait( m_data_written_event );
00038 
00039   }
00040 
00041   return buffer->read_data();
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00045 template < typename T>
00046 inline
00047 bool
00048 tlm_fifo<T>::nb_peek( T &t ) const {
00049 
00050   if( used() < 1 ) {
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053 
00054   t = buffer->peek_data( 0 );
00055   return true;
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 template < typename T>
00060 inline
00061 bool
00062 tlm_fifo<T>::nb_peek( T &t , int n ) const {
00063 
00064   if( n >= used() || n < -1 ) {
00065     return false;
00066   }
00067   
00068   if( n == -1 ) {
00069     n = used() - 1;
00070   }
00071 
00072   t = buffer->peek_data( n );
00073   return true;
00074 
00075 }
00076     
00077 template< typename T >
00078 inline
00079 bool
00080 tlm_fifo<T>::nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<T> * ) const
00081 {
00082   return !is_empty();
00083 }
00084 
00085 template < typename T>
00086 inline
00087 bool
00088 tlm_fifo<T>::nb_poke( const T &t , int n ) {
00089 
00090   if( n >= used() || n < 0 ) {
00091     return false;
00092   }
00093 
00094   buffer->poke_data( n ) = t;
00095   return true;
00096 
00097 }
